description:
Love hurts and Yuma’s about to find out why!  Yuma broke Anna’s heart years ago, and now she’s back for revenge! If Yuma loses, he has to be Anna’s boyfriend… forever!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Railroad Deck Takeoff! Runaway Duelist Anna
Tetsudou Deck Hasshin! Bousou Duelist Anna
鉄道デッキ発進! 暴走決闘者(デュエリスト)アンナ
